title: Ship-borne Satellite Communication Station
explain: The Ship-borne Satellite Communication Station is a kind of SATCOM ground station that is installed on ships or other types of sea vessels. It is designed for On-the-move (OTM) communication between the coast and ships as well as communication between different ships.
features:
Function

  • Services of voice, data and image can be transmitted on-the-move

System Feature

  • On-the-move transmission of BLOS,multiple-service, large capacity and highquality service
  • Depending on the ship size, multiple antenna apertures are optional
form:
Specifications
Operation bandC / Ku / Ka
Antenna aperture1.2m-2.4m, optional
PA power1W ~ 1kW, optional
Data rate64kbps~8Mbps
